title: 5: A Good Suspect
itunes:title: 5: A Good Suspect
itunes:subtitle: The murder of a Frenchwoman transforms a rural Irish community.
description:
The guards have a suspect—one who has spent the last 20 years trying to convince Ireland that he is not a murderer. We begin on the first day of the investigation, tracing the suspects’ behavior over the six weeks following the murder, up until the day of his arrest. What was he up to, and how did he become the central figure in one of Ireland’s most notorious murder cases? To be first to listen to bonus episodes of West Cork and Sam and Jennifer's incredible next series, sign up at www.yarn.fm

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
